sentence.Network_cn: 哥伦比亚队凭借流畅的传球和终场前的制胜进球击败了他们。

sentence.Network_en: It was just a passing comment, he didn't go on about it.
sentence.Network_cn: 那只是一笔带过的评论，他没有继续论述。

sentence.Network_en: I sat in the garden and watched the passing cars.
sentence.Network_cn: 我坐在花园里，看着过往车辆。

entry.tran: 短暂的；一时的；转瞬即逝的
entry.def: A passing fashion, activity, or feeling lasts for only a short period of time and is not worth taking very seriously.

example.ex: Hamnett does not believe environmental concern is a passing fad...
example.tran: 哈姆内特认为对环境的关注不是一时心血来潮。

example.ex: He had never taken more than a passing interest in the girl.
example.tran: 他对那个女孩只有三分钟热情。

entry.def: The passing of something such as a time or system is the fact of its coming to an end.

example.ex: It was an historic day, yet its passing was not marked by the slightest excitement...
example.tran: 那是具有历史意义的一天，但是一天过去了，也没有一丝的兴奋激动。

example.ex: When the Fifties faded into history, there wasn't a lot of mourning for the passing of an era.
example.tran: 当50年代成为历史，人们并未对一个时代的结束感到有多么悲伤。

entry.def: You can refer to someone's death as their passing, if you want to avoid using the word 'death' because you think it might upset or offend people.

example.ex: His passing will be mourned by many people.
example.tran: 很多人都会哀悼他的逝世。

example.ex: ...the passing of one of this century's great artists, Miles Davis.
example.tran: 本世纪艺术巨匠迈尔斯·戴维斯的逝世

entry.def: The passing of a period of time is the fact or process of its going by.

example.ex: The passing of time brought a sense of emptiness...
example.tran: 时间的流逝带来了一丝空虚感。

example.ex: The passing of the years has been kind to Dan. He looks like a man of half his age.
example.tran: 岁月对丹很仁慈，他看起来只有他年龄的一半大。

entry.def: A passing mention or reference is brief and is made while you are talking or writing about something else.

example.ex: It was just a passing comment, he didn't go on about it...
example.tran: 那只是一笔带过的评论，他没有继续论述。

example.ex: The colonies received only a passing mention.
example.tran: 那些殖民地只是顺带提了一下。

entry.def: If you mention something in passing, you mention it briefly while you are talking or writing about something else.

example.ex: In passing, it should be noted that...
The army is only mentioned in passing.
example.tran: 只是顺带提了一下陆军。

entry.def: If something changes with each passing year or with every passing day, it changes continuously.

example.ex: His stomach had grown more prominent with every passing year...
example.tran: 他的肚子一年比一年鼓。

example.ex: Work becomes harder with each passing day.

means.word_mean: 1. (American football) a play that involves one player throwing the ball to a teammate;

sentences.sentence: "the coach sent in a passing play on third and long"

means.word_mean: 3. the motion of one object relative to another;

sentences.sentence: "stellar passings can perturb the orbits of comets"

means.word_mean: 5. a bodily process of passing from one place or stage to another;

sentences.sentence: "the passage of air from the lungs"

means.word_mean: 6. going by something that is moving in order to get in front of it;

sentences.sentence: "she drove but well but her reckless passing of every car on the road frightened me"

means.word_mean: 7. success in satisfying a test or requirement;

sentences.sentence: "his future depended on his passing that test"
"he got a pass in introductory chemistry"
"love is transitory but at is eternal"

means.word_mean: 2. of advancing the ball by throwing it;

sentences.sentence: "a team with a good passing attack"

means.word_mean: 3. allowing you to pass (e.g., an examination or inspection) satisfactorily;
4. hasty and without attention to detail; not thorough;

sentences.sentence: "a casual (or cursory) inspection failed to reveal the house's structural flaws"

means.word_mean: 1. to an extreme degree or extent;

What has prevented the passing of work-family balance laws in the United States?
The passing of the new transport act.

sentences.en: ‘What did the minister say about educational reform?’ ‘Not very much. He just mentioned it in passing.’
sentences.cn: “部长对于教育改革有何评论？”“没说太多，他只是顺便提了几句。”

sentences.en: Could I just say in passing that … ?
